How To Guides
=============

<!--- Referenzierung an anderen Positionen mÃ¶glich, wird nicht angezeigt --->
(howto)=

### Example UUIDs
In all How To Guides the following UUID is used as example: 3ff971b1-8b16-4ede-90b0-2d3ac5a9f8d3

### How do I verify a UUID?
```
python3 main.py uuid=3ff971b1-8b16-4ede-90b0-2d3ac5a9f8d3
```
